About.about-p1: Hi! I'm 31 years old, from Brazil, delivering solutions since 2021.
About.about-p2: Fell in love with programming when I started a fullstack development course. That was my first glance on the tech area, besides gaming, making me hungry for knowledge.
About.about-p3: Nowadays, I'm commited to improve my skills as a developer while I search for a new opening.
About.about-p4: I'm always aiming to deliver the best possible solution.

list.i1: Support and Development Activities: started in the support area to gain knowledge of internal workflows, modules, and quality processes, later transitioning to development tasks within the systemâ€™s microservices.
list.i2: Maintenance and Feature Implementation: worked on minor real-world tasks such as bug fixes, translation adjustments, and the addition or modification of functionalities in existing services, always under the guidance of a senior developer.
list.i3: Microservices Architecture: contributed to a system built with multiple microservices, leveraging Java 8, Spring Boot, JPA, Eureka, and API Gateway, deployed on JBoss, and integrated with SQL Server and Oracle databases.

list.i1: Feature Development & Maintenance: implemented new features and ensured continuous maintenance of the platform, working on functionalities such as document, teacher, student, and schedule management, as well as UI components including pop-ups, modals, banners, and marketing promotion tools.
list.i2: Design to Code Implementation: translated Figma designs into responsive layouts, ensuring consistency and usability across the platform.
list.i3: Team Collaboration: worked closely with two other developers (backend and frontend support), actively participating in agile ceremonies (Scrum), sprint planning, code reviews, and pair programming sessions.
list.i4: Technical Skills: strengthened expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frontend frameworks, contributing to the platform's growth and user experience improvements.

list.i1: Hands-on Experience in a Real Project: took part in a development residency at Cubos Academy, working as a frontend developer on Unmaze, a language learning platform.
list.i2: Feature Implementation & UI Development: contributed to the implementation of new features and developed responsive interfaces from Figma prototypes, ensuring usability and design consistency.
list.i3: Team Collaboration: collaborated with frontend and backend teammates, applying agile methodologies (Scrum) through maintenance tasks, code reviews, and continuous delivery.
list.i4: Foundation for Professional Experience: the work carried out in this project became the foundation and was later continued professionally, evolving into the role described in the following work experience.

list.i1: Mentorship: guided junior developers in Next.js, TypeScript, React Query, and Node.js, emphasizing mobile-first and pair programming.
list.i2: Project Management: applied agile methodologies (Scrum) and used GitHub for task tracking and team alignment.
list.i3: UI/Frontend: built responsive interfaces from Figma designs using React, Next.js, Ant Design, and Tailwind CSS.
list.i4: DevOps: maintained CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions) and implemented OAuth integration for secure authentication.

content.description: E-mail and content are required fields.
